mapper.insert: insert into user(kid, username, nickname, email, address, regdate) values(#{kid}, #{username},#{nickname}, #{email}, #{address}, now());
mapper.select: select f.fid, f.kid, f.aptCode, info.aptName from favor f join houseinfo info where f.aptCode=info.aptCode and f.kid=#{kid} order by regdate desc
mapper.delete: delete from favor where kid=#{kid} and aptCode = #{aptCode}
